content:
1. Neeyallo nyangallkkulllla divyasampattheshuve
Neeyallaathilla bhoovilaagrahippaanaarume (2)
/tneeyallo nyangallkkulllla........

2. Annannu nyangallkkullllathellaam thannu pottunnon
Innumennum koodeyundennulllla vaakkuthannavan (2)
/tneeyallo.....

Kartthaave, ninte krpayaal bhakshippaanum paanam cheyvaanum nee nyangallkku thannittulllla aahaarattheyum, ninte karunayeyum ortth, ninne sthuthikkukayum vandikkukayum cheyvaan nyangalle yogyaraakkaname. (aammeen).
